text:
few members of the Tamil Nadu Makkal Nala Paniyalargal Sangam were arrested here on Thursday after they staged a protest urging the State government to reinstate the 13,500 workers. They were led by the state president Chellapandian

They assembled at Chinthamani and raised slogans but they were arrested as permission was not granted. They urged the Chief Minister to take steps to withdraw the appeal filed by the State in the Supreme Court and reinstate them. Police said a total of 37 workers were arrested. They were released later. The sangam has been conducting the stir at different places since January 4.
title: TAMIL NADU
